Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case 1 RA VF AE RMI VF AD SC AC Case 2 RA VF AE AD SC AC Case 3 RA VF AE RMI RMI VF AD SC AC Start RA Then VF Then AE After AE Case 2 straight to AD Case 1 RMI VF AD Case 3 RMI RMI VF AD Common prefix RA VF AE Common suffix AD SC AC

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After AE optional structure RMI repeated then VF RMI always followed by VF eventually VF in middle after RMI

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Middle X ( tau -> ( * ( RMI tau ) VF ) ) Loop RMI tau allows one or more RMI then VF XOR makes optional for zero RMI

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Case 1 RMI VF matches loop once Case 3 RMI RMI VF matches loop twice Case 2 empty matches tau Matches all traces

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - PE
Text: Alternative * ( tau -> ( RMI VF ) ) generates RMI VF but not RMI RMI VF Does not fit Case 3 Rejected

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: VF outside loop after RMIs fits business logic request multiple times then validate Aligns with observed one or more RMIs followed by VF

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Full traces match RA VF AE middle AD SC AC No VF without RMI in middle No RMI without following VF Strict sequence no parallelism

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Balances fitness precision simplicity standard operators Loop XOR Sequence
